node.html: Implemented KNN method from scratch using Python, for user-based and item-based collaborative filtering to predict ratings of movies. Compared and analyzed similarity metrics like cosine, person correlation, etc to improve the recommendation score.

frontmatter.title: Diamond Prices Prediction using supervised learning

node.html: Performed data cleaning and used supervised machine learning algorithms Decision Trees and ensembling techniques Random Forest and XGBoost for predicting diamond prices. Performed hyperparameter tuning to improve the accuracy to 98%.
